tasks.label: Bump version to 0.4.8 and build
tasks.command: sed -i 's/version = "[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+"/version = "0.4.8"/' pyproject.toml && sed -i 's/version="[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+"/version="0.4.8"/' setup.py && sed -i 's/__version__ = "[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+"/__version__ = "0.4.8"/' HydroOpt/__init__.py && rm -rf dist && python -m build
